mapper.insert: insert into joyoung_material_arrival( kkl_master_no, kkl_master_id, arrival_date, remark, process_flag, process_time, process_comment, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, quarter ) VALUES( #{kklMasterNo}, #{kklMasterId}, #{arrivalDate}, #{remark}, #{processFlag}, #{processTime}, #{processComment}, #{createById}, #{createDt}, #{updateById}, #{updateDt}, #{quarter} )
mapper.update: UPDATE joyoung_material_arrival SET process_flag = #{processFlag}, process_time = process_time+1, process_comment = #{processComment}, update_date = #{updateDt} WHERE id = #{id}
